messages.content: Hello! How can I assist you with your database queries today?

To list all columns from the `inventory` table, you can use the following SQL query:

```sql
SELECT * FROM inventory;
```

If you need anything else, feel free to ask!

To group the results by item in the `inventory` table, you can use the following SQL query:

```sql
SELECT * FROM inventory
GROUP BY item;
```

If you need to aggregate any specific columns, please let me know!

To list all columns from the `inventory` table, you can use the following SQL query:

```sql
SELECT * FROM inventory;
```

If you have any other requests or need further assistance, just let me know!

To show the columns of the `inventory` table, you can use the following SQL query:

```sql
SHOW COLUMNS FROM inventory;
```

If you need further assistance or have more queries, just let me know!
